creator: kelvinyap1998@yahoo.com
text:
The value for the ServletContext Attribute "org.apache.catalina.jsp_classpath" 
seems to have an alien '/' character. I suppose this will make the first 
classpath not working.

Details
-------

ServletContext Attribute Name : 
"org.apache.catalina.jsp_classpath"

ServletContext Attribute Value : 
"/F:/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-exam/webapps/examples/WEB-INF/classes/;F:/jakarta-
tomcat-4.1.24-exam/shared/classes/;F:/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-
exam/common/classes/;F:/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-
exam/common/endorsed/xercesImpl.jar ... ... ... ..."

creator: remm@apache.org
text: No, it works fine. Ignore the alien '/'.
